title: Calories in Tres Leches Cake
meta_description: Learn calories in tres leches cake per slice, including carbs, sugars, fat, protein, and full nutrition facts for easy tracking.
assumptions: Standard slice (~100 g), soaked in evaporated milk, condensed milk, whole milk; topped with whipped cream; no added fruit.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by recipe, portion size, brand, and preparation method. Check labels or recipes for accuracy.

quick_answer.text: One slice of tres leches cake has about 295 kcal, mostly from sugars and fat in the milk soak and topping.

label_note: Values align with Nutrition Facts labels for straightforward comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one slice of tres leches cake?
What are the carbs in tres leches cake?
faqs.a: About 40 g carbs per slice, with 30 g from sugars due to the condensed milk.

faqs.q: Is tres leches cake high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, 12 g total fat per slice, including 7 g saturated from cream and milks.

faqs.q: How much protein in tres leches cake?
faqs.a: Roughly 5 g protein per slice, mainly from the eggs and milk.

faqs.q: Does tres leches cake have fiber?
faqs.a: Very little, about 0.5 g per slice; it's a rich dessert with minimal fiber.
